resources.string: Try not To Kill yourself, mid game
You win if your last alive
You have bigger change winning in squad! or do youâ€¦?
You can at least try to win
Mama didn\'t raise no quitters, but apparently your dad did
Only kill the last person that\'s not on your team
You may only use snipers, also you may only use hip-fire
You may only use melee. Though, if you kill someone you may use their weapons
If your in squad or duo, you may not communicate
If your in squad or duo, you may not communicate except saying coordinates
If your in squad or duo, if any member sees a care-package you must immediately run to it. You may kill enemies that try to kill you.

If your in squad or duo, if any member sees a care-package you must immediately run to it. You may not kill enemies that try to kill you. when you or another team picked up the care package you may start killing enemies
If your in squad or duo, Kill your teammate/teammates and then win the game. Do not tell them
If your in squad or duo, Kill your teammate/teammates when only 1 squad left except yours, and still win the game.
If your in squad or duo, you may not say the letter E when communicating
If your in squad or duo, Kill 25 people together
if your in squad or duo kill 5 each
if your in squad or duo, kill 5 each(reader, you get 2 kills from killing a teammate)
if your in squad or duo, kill 5 each (reader, you get 3 kills from killing a teammate. However, you need 6 kills)
if your in squad or duo, 1 person need to have all the kills
if your in squad or duo, 1 person need to have all the kills and also the worst teammate
if your in squad or duo, 1 person need to have all the kills and also the best teammate
if your in squad or duo, 2 people need to increase their sensitivity by 3 times, and the other 2 decrease by half. if you\'re duo 1 do increase 1 do decrease.
if your in squad or duo, everyone increase their sensitivity by 3 times. choose one in your team to increase it by 5 times
if your in squad or duo, Get to location. Squad: 1 member jump every 10 seconds from the bus. Duo: one every 20 seconds
if your in squad or duo, if a teammate is down you may not help him
if your in squad or duo, if a teammate is down you must save him
Win two times on same location
You must sneak up to enemies, if they spot you, you must retreat to hiding. If you fire first before being spotted you got 3 seconds to kill otherwise you must retreat.
you must before killing an enemy do a 360
you must before killing an enemy make a dance move
You must always get to the highest hilltop in the Zone
have mouse on the opposite side
If you find a Crossbow you must drop all your other weapons and only use the Crossbow
If you find a Pistol you must drop all your other weapons and only use the Pistol
